info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:23PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Berkshire County through 400 PM EDT... At 322 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Monroe to near Hancock. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, North Adams, Adams, Cheshire, Florida, Savoy, East Windsor, Berkshire, Dalton, Lanesborough, Hinsdale, Windsor, Peru, Soldiers Memorial Field, Cheshire Harbor, Arnoldville, Town Crest Village, Lakeview Terrace, Maple Grove and Eastern Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for western Massachusetts...and east central New York.
